characterInfo.Occupation: Sect of Shinovar (1138 - 1174),  International Assassin (1167 - 1174), Knight Radiant (present)
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Arcanum Unbounded, Edgedancer, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Szeth, (also known as Szeth-son-son-Vallano and Szeth-son-Neturo, after his predecessors, and the Assassin in White), Truthless of Shinovar is a Surgebinder and an assassin.
